ygData.subject: Rallas Zek Forever!!!

ygData.messageBody:

No No - ahhh I am so sorry. I will never lose sight of the honor and glory
of the battle - Rallos Zek is my true lord and protector!

For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;

Patty of Halas
username: Patricia
